hiveArticle.body:
### <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone </center>

<hr>

###  <center>My today's entry for #TreeTuesday </center>

I travelled to Coorg last week and found this amazing looking scene. I actually do not know the name of the trees, but what's interesting is that the height of all the trees are almost the same just like mother nature wants each and every child of his to get equal opportunity. 

<hr>

![_DSC0045.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVrJHwPxA2fdkafynwAW6JF1FuXrse72NePHLDJBma46y/_DSC0045.jpg)

<hr>

### <center>Camera - Nokia 6, No Editing</center>

<hr>

### <center>Follow @codingdefined</center>
